gff.help_message: [b]KEYS[/b]\• Press [color=blue]arrow left[/color] or [color=blue]key 4[/color] and [color=blue]arrow right[/color] or [color=blue]key 6[/color] to switch between local files and Bluetooth files.\• Press [color=blue]left menu[/color] to open/close main menu.\• Press [color=blue]right menu[/color] to execute on-screen fast command.\• Press [color=blue]key #[/color] or [color=blue]key *[/color] to select/unselect current item.\• Press [color=blue]key 1[/color] to copy currently selected items to clipboard.\• Press [color=blue]key 3[/color] to paste items from clipboard to current folder.\• Press [color=blue]key 0[/color] to enter into/exit from fullscreen mode: a view without top and bottom bars.\\[b]MENU[/b]\[color=#800080]When a menu item contains an icon, you can press that shortcut key to execute associated command.[/color]\• Press [color=blue]arrow up[/color] or [color=blue]key 2[/color] and [color=blue]arrow down[/color] or [color=blue]key 8[/color] to move between commands.\• Press [color=blue]FIRE key[/color] or [color=blue]key 5[/color] to execute currently selected command.\• Press [color=blue]left menu[/color] or [color=blue]BACK key[/color] to close main menu.\\[b]DIALOGS[/b]\• Press [color=blue]left menu[/color] to press left button ([color=green]green[/color]).\• Press [color=blue]right menu[/color] to press right button ([color=red]red[/color]).\• Press [color=blue]FIRE key[/color] or [color=blue]key 5[/color] to press button (when single).
gff.bt_mex: [color=#FF8080]This device doesn't support the Bluetooth API (JSR-82), so you can't connect to any remote device.[/color]
gff.bt_off: [color=#FF8080]Please turn on Bluetooth\and restart the program![/color]
gff.fc_mex: [color=#FF8080]This device doesn't support the FileConnection API (JSR-75), so you can't access to filesystem of your device.[/color]
gff.dialog_bt_off_message: Bluetooth is currently [b]OFF[/b]! Please, [u][color=blue]turn on Bluetooth[/color][/u] and restart the program.
gff.version_message: A new version of this program, [b][color=blue]v%1[/color][/b], was found online, you can freely download it here: [url]http://blueftp.medieval.it[/url]
gff.donation_message: If you like this software, please, consider to make us a [b][color=blue]donation[/color][/b]!\Software development really needs a lot of time and efforts ... surf to [url]http://blueftp.medieval.it/[/url] and let us to continue free software development, with a small donation!
